    <script type="text/javascript">
     var pageX;
         var pageY;
         var previousKey;
 
         $(document).bind('mousemove', function (e) {
             pageX = e.pageX;
             pageY = e.pageY;
         });
 
         $(document).ready(function () {
             DoStuff();
         });
         function DoStuff() {
 
             var config = {
                 over: function () {
                     var position = $("#imgPartner").position();
                     position.top = position.top + 35;
                     position.left = position.left - 240 + 47; //shifting left the width of the div less the width of the icon
                     $("#PartnerDiv").css(position);
                     $("#PartnerDiv").slideDown("fast");
                 },
                 timeout: 600,
                 out: function () {
                     $("#PartnerDiv").slideUp("fast");
                 }
             };
 
             $("#partnerWrapper").hoverIntent(config);
 
             
 //            var config = {
 //                over: function () {
 //                    var position = $("#imgCart").position();
 //                    position.top = position.top + 35;
 //                    position.left = position.left - 200 + 47; //shifting left the width of the div less the width of the icon
 //                    var currentTime = new Date(); //used to append timestamp below to prevent caching the get call
 //                    $.get('/GetCartDiv.aspx?preventCache=' + currentTime.toString(), function (data) {
 //                        $('#CartDiv').html(data);
 //                        $("#CartDiv").css(position);
 //                        $("#CartDiv").slideDown("fast");
 //                    });
 //                },
 //                timeout: 600,
 //                out: function () {
 //                    $("#CartDiv").slideUp("fast");
 //                }
 //            };
 
 //            $("#cartWrapper").hoverIntent(config);
 
             setSearch();
 
             setLoginDialog();
 
             $("#loginAnchor").css("cursor", "pointer");
 
             $("#loginAnchor").click(function () {
                 var x = pageX - 215;
                 var y = pageY + 10;
                 $("#loginDiv input[type=button]").button();
                 $("#loginDiv input[type=submit]").button();
                 $("#loginDiv a").button();
                 $("#loginDiv").dialog("option", "position", [x, y]);
                 $("#loginDiv").dialog("open");
 
             });
 
             $('#dialogCheckout').dialog({
                 autoOpen : false,
                 modal : true,
                 resizable : false,
                 height: 500,
                 maxHeight: 500,
                 maxWidth: 600,
                 minWidth: 550,
                 title : "Cart Contents"
             });
 
 
             $("#pwrx-continue-shopping")
                 .button()
                 .click(function () {
                     ContinueShoppingBtnClicked();
                 })
                 .next()
                 .button({
                     text: false,
                     icons: {
                         primary: "ui-icon-triangle-1-s"
                     }
                 })
             .click(function () {
                 var menu = $(this).parent().next().show().css({position: "absolute"}).position({
                     my: "right top",
                     at: "right bottom",
                     of: this
                 });
                 $(document).one("click", function () {
                     menu.hide();
                 });
 
                 return false;
             })
                 .parent()
                 .buttonset()
                 .next()
                 .hide()
                 .menu();
 
             $('#pwrx-close-cart-dialog').click(function () {
                 ContinueShoppingBtnClicked();
             });
 
             $('#pwrx-go-to-home').click(function () {
                 location.replace('/Home.aspx');
             });
 
             $('#pwrx-last-search').click(function () {
                 location.replace('/Result.aspx?' + $(this).data('query-string'));
             });
 
            
 
 
         }
 
         function ContinueShoppingBtnClicked() {
             $('#dialogCheckout').dialog('close');
         }
 
         function GoHomeClicked() {
             
         }
 
         function setSearch() {
             $("#txtSearch").autocomplete({
                 source: function (request, response) {
                     var sessno = $('#hfUserSessionId').val();
                     var compno = $('#hfCompanyCustomerId').val();
                     $.ajax({
                         url: '/AutoComplete.asmx/GetPartList',
                         data: "{'prefixText': '" + request.term + "', 'secureId':'" + sessno.toString() + "', 'companyCustomerId':'" + compno.toString() + "'}",
                         dataType: "json",
                         type: "POST",
                         contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",
                         success: function (data) {
                             response($.map(data.d, function (item) {
                                 return {
                                     value: item
                                 }
                             }))
                         },
                         error: function (response) { /*alert(response.responseText);  //note: just let this return a silent error */ }
                     });
                 },
                 minLength: 1
             }).live("blur", function () {
                 var default_value = $(this).attr("rel");
                 if ($(this).val() == "") {
                     $(this).val(default_value)
                         .attr("style", "font-style:italic; color:silver;");
                 }
             }).live("focus", function () {
                 var default_value = $(this).attr("rel");
                 if ($(this).val() == default_value) {
                     $(this).val("")
                         .removeAttr("style");
                 }
             });
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
             $("#txtSearch").keypress(function (event) {
                 captureKeyPress(event);
 
             });
 
         }
 
         function captureKeyPress(e) {
             var charCode;
             //            if (e && e.which) {
             //                e = e;
             //                charCode = e.which;
             //            }
             //            else {
             //                e = event;
             charCode = e.keyCode;
             //            }
             if (charCode == 13) {
                 //38 is UP, 40 is DOWN
                 if ((previousKey != 38) && (previousKey != 40)) {
                     DoSearch();
                     e.returnValue = false;
                     e.cancel = true;
                     e.preventDefault();
                 }
                 previousKey = charCode;
 
             }
             else {
                 previousKey = charCode;
                 return true;
             }
 
         }
 
         function DoSearch() {
             var s = $("#txtSearch").val();
             if (s == "") {
                 alert("Please enter a search value");
 
             }
             else {
                 s = URLEncode(s);
                 var url = "/Result.aspx?q=" + s;
 
                 window.open(url, "_self");
                 //window.location.href = '/Result.aspx?q=' + URLEncode(s);
             }
         }
 
         function URLEncode(str) {
             return encodeURIComponent(str);
         }
 
         function setLoginDialog() {
             $("#loginDiv").dialog({
                 autoOpen: false,
                 height: 150,
                 width: 330,
                 modal: true,
                 title: "Powerex Login",
                 close: function (event, ui) {
                     try {
                         lgnProductMaster = 0;
                         lgnQty = 0;
                     }
                     catch (err) {
                     }
                 }
             });
         }
    </script>
